content.text: is designed to generate a report on the base budget staging by agency, specifically focusing on energy usage and costs. It aggregates and organizes budget data by agency and energy type, and it provides a detailed breakdown of energy usage and costs across different time periods and organizational levels. The procedure uses temporary tables to manage and manipulate data before producing the final datasets for reporting.
The complexity of this stored procedure is high due to several factors:
It involves multiple temporary tables and Common Table Expressions (CTEs) for data manipulation.
It performs complex data aggregation and pivoting operations.
It includes hierarchical data processing and grouping by different organizational levels.
It generates multiple datasets for reporting purposes.
: This parameter is used to identify the user or recipient of the report. It may be used for filtering or logging purposes.
: This parameter specifies the agency code(s) for which the report is generated. It is used to filter the data to include only relevant agencies.
to prevent the message indicating the number of rows affected by a SQL statement. It initializes several variables and temporary tables to store intermediate data.
: It retrieves the current scenario ID and fiscal year from the
It uses CTEs to construct a hierarchy of agencies based on their division levels.
It filters agencies using a function
to get all child agencies of the specified agency code.
It inserts aggregated budget data into the
table, grouping by agency and energy type.
It calculates sums for energy usage, facility points, and various dollar amounts.
It further aggregates data for parent agencies at different levels (Level 1 and Level 2) to provide a consolidated view.
It calculates total costs for each agency and inserts this data into the temporary table.
It generates three datasets: a report title, budget by energy type, and budget by utility company and service class.
It uses pivot operations to transform monthly data into a tabular format for reporting.
: The procedure handles potentially large datasets, which can impact performance. The use of temporary tables and CTEs may lead to increased memory and CPU usage.
: Ensure that the underlying tables, especially those involved in joins and aggregations, are properly indexed to optimize query performance.
: The use of temporary tables may lead to contention if the procedure is executed concurrently by multiple users.
: As data volume grows, the performance of the procedure may degrade, especially during aggregation and pivot operations.
: The procedure lacks explicit error handling, which could lead to unhandled exceptions and incomplete data processing.
: Ensure that the procedure is executed with appropriate permissions to prevent unauthorized data access.
: The procedure assumes that the data in the source tables is accurate and consistent. Any discrepancies could affect the accuracy of the report.
: The complexity of the procedure may make it challenging to maintain and update, especially if business requirements change.

CREATE PROCEDURE [budget].[usp_Report_BaseBudgetStagingByAgency_Updated]
(
	@EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75)
	,@AgencyCodeOEC AS VARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;

	DECLARE @AnnualOrMonthly AS CHAR(1) = 'M';

	DECLARE @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency TABLE(BudgetStage VARCHAR(100) NULL
		,PublishedBillingPeriod VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,BillingPeriod VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,AgencyCodeOEC VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,AgencyName VARCHAR(75) NULL
		,EnergyDeliveryType VARCHAR(3) NULL
		,BudgetGroupDEM INT NULL
		,BudgetGroupDEMName VARCHAR(75) NULL
		,GenericEnergyDeliveryType VARCHAR(24) NULL
		,GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit VARCHAR(24) NULL
		,EnergyUsage DECIMAL(18,2) NULL
		,StreetLightingFacilityPoints INT NULL
		,FacilityPointDollars MONEY NULL
		,EnergyDollars MONEY NULL
		,DemandDollars MONEY NULL
		,AgencyDivisionSeqId INT NULL
		,AgencyOECL1 VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,AgencyOECL2 VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,AgencyOECL3 VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,AgencyLevel INT NULL);

	DECLARE @AgencyDivision TABLE(AgencyCodeOEC VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY
		,parentAgencyCode VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,grandParantAgencyCode VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,agencyLevel INT NULL
		,AgencyOECL1 VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,AgencyOECL2 VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,AgencyOECL3 VARCHAR(6) NULL
		,AgencyDivisionHierarchy HIERARCHYID NULL
		,AgencyShortDesc VARCHAR(75) NULL
		,AgencyDivisionSeqId INT NULL
		,IsHidden CHAR(1) NULL);

	DECLARE @fy AS INT, @publishedBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(7), @currentScenarioId AS INT;
	
	SELECT @currentScenarioId = ISNULL(MAX(ID),0), @fy = MAX(FY)
	FROM budget.Scenario WHERE IsCurrentBudget = 1;

	SELECT @publishedBillingPeriod = CAST(@fy-2 AS VARCHAR(4)) + '01';
	--=========================================================================
	-- 1 parepare agency division
	--=========================================================================

    WITH agencyRaw AS (SELECT a.AgencyID
			,b.ParentAgencyID
			,CAST(b.AgencyDivisionHierarchy AS VARCHAR(100)) AS hierarchy
			,LEN(CAST(b.AgencyDivisionHierarchy AS VARCHAR(100)))-LEN(REPLACE(CAST(b.AgencyDivisionHierarchy AS VARCHAR(100)), '/','')) AS times
			,b.AgencyDivisionHierarchy.GetLevel() AS agencyLevel
		FROM Preload.Agency AS a
			INNER JOIN Preload.AgencyByFY AS b ON a.AgencyId = b.AgencyId
		WHERE b.FY = @fy)
    ,agencyHierarchy AS (SELECT AgencyID, agencyLevel, ParentAgencyId, NULL AS GrandParentAgencyId FROM agencyRaw WHERE times IN (2, 3)
		UNION
		SELECT AgencyID, agencyLevel, ParentAgencyId, SUBSTRING(hierarchy,2, CHARINDEX('/',hierarchy, 2)-2) AS GrandParentAgencyId FROM agencyRaw WHERE times = 4)
    ,filteredAgencies AS (SELECT AgencyCodeOEC FROM billing.uftn_TableGetAllAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCodeOEC, @EmailAddress))

    INSERT INTO @AgencyDivision
        (AgencyCodeOEC
        ,parentAgencyCode
        ,grandParantAgencyCode
        ,agencyLevel
        ,AgencyOECL1
        ,AgencyOECL2
        ,AgencyOECL3
        ,AgencyDivisionHierarchy
		,AgencyShortDesc
		,AgencyDivisionSeqId
		,IsHidden)
    SELECT DISTINCT child.AgencyCodeOEC
		,parent.AgencyCodeOEC AS parentAgencyCode
		,grandParent.AgencyCodeOEC AS grandParantAgencyCode
		,child.AgencyDivisionHierarchy.GetLevel() AS agencyLevel
		,IIF(a.agencyLevel = 3, grandParent.AgencyCodeOEC, IIF(a.agencyLevel = 2, parent.AgencyCodeOEC, child.AgencyCodeOEC)) AS AgencyOECL1
		,IIF(a.agencyLevel = 3, parent.AgencyCodeOEC, IIF(a.agencyLevel = 2, child.AgencyCodeOEC, '000000')) AS AgencyOECL2
		,IIF(a.agencyLevel = 3, child.AgencyCodeOEC, '000000') AS AgencyOECL3
		,child.AgencyDivisionHierarchy
		,child.AgencyName
		,a.agencyId AS AgencyDivisionSeqId
		,'N' AS IsHidden
    FROM agencyHierarchy AS a
        INNER JOIN Preload.vwAgencies AS child ON child.FY = @fy AND a.AgencyId = child.AgencyId
        INNER JOIN filteredAgencies AS f ON child.AgencyCodeOEC = f.AgencyCodeOEC
        LEFT JOIN Preload.Agency AS parent ON a.ParentAgencyId = parent.AgencyId
        LEFT JOIN Preload.Agency AS grandParent ON a.GrandParentAgencyId = grandParent.AgencyId;

    --=========================================================================
    -- 2 Add base budget data
    --=========================================================================
    INSERT INTO @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency
        (BudgetStage
        ,PublishedBillingPeriod
        ,BillingPeriod
        ,AgencyCodeOEC
        ,AgencyName
        ,EnergyDeliveryType
        ,BudgetGroupDEM
        ,BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
        ,EnergyUsage
        ,StreetLightingFacilityPoints
        ,FacilityPointDollars
        ,EnergyDollars
        ,DemandDollars
        ,AgencyDivisionSeqId
        ,AgencyOECL1
		,AgencyOECL2
		,AgencyOECL3
		,AgencyLevel)
    SELECT B.BudgetStage
        ,@publishedBillingPeriod AS PublishedBillingPeriod
        ,CASE WHEN @AnnualOrMonthly = 'M' THEN MAX(B.BillingPeriod) ELSE '' END
        ,B.AgencyCodeOEC
        ,B.AgencyName
        ,B.EnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEM
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
        ,SUM(B.EnergyUsage)
        ,SUM(B.StreetLightingFacilityPoints)
        ,SUM(B.FacilityPointDollars)
        ,SUM(B.EnergyDollars)
        ,SUM(B.DemandDollars)
        ,A.AgencyDivisionSeqId
        ,A.AgencyOECL1
		,A.AgencyOECL2
		,A.AgencyOECL3
		,A.agencyLevel
    FROM budget.vwBaseBudgetByAgencySummaryByAgencyEnergyType AS B
        INNER JOIN @AgencyDivision AS A ON B.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
    WHERE B.scenarioid = @currentScenarioId
    GROUP BY B.BudgetStage
		,CASE WHEN @AnnualOrMonthly = 'M' THEN B.BillingPeriod END
		,B.AgencyCodeOEC
		,B.AgencyName
		,B.EnergyDeliveryType
		,B.BudgetGroupDEM
		,B.BudgetGroupDEMName
		,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
		,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
		,A.AgencyDivisionSeqId
		,A.AgencyOECL1
		,A.AgencyOECL2
		,A.AgencyOECL3
		,A.agencyLevel;

    --=========================================================================
    -- 3 group data for parent agencies
    --=========================================================================
    -- level 1 data
    INSERT INTO @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency
        (BudgetStage
        ,PublishedBillingPeriod
        ,BillingPeriod
        ,AgencyCodeOEC
        ,AgencyName
        ,EnergyDeliveryType
        ,BudgetGroupDEM
        ,BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
        ,EnergyUsage
        ,StreetLightingFacilityPoints
        ,FacilityPointDollars
        ,EnergyDollars
        ,DemandDollars
        ,AgencyDivisionSeqId
        ,AgencyOECL1
		,AgencyOECL2
		,AgencyOECL3
		,AgencyLevel)
    SELECT B.BudgetStage
        ,B.PublishedBillingPeriod
        ,B.BillingPeriod
        ,B.AgencyOECL1
        ,MAX(A.AgencyShortDesc)
        ,B.EnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEM
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
        ,SUM(B.EnergyUsage)
        ,SUM(B.StreetLightingFacilityPoints)
        ,SUM(B.FacilityPointDollars)
        ,SUM(B.EnergyDollars)
        ,SUM(B.DemandDollars)
        ,MAX(A.AgencyDivisionSeqId)
        ,B.AgencyOECL1
		,'000000' AS AgencyOECL2
		,'000000' AS AgencyOECL3
		,MAX(A.agencyLevel)
    FROM @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency AS B
	    INNER JOIN @AgencyDivision AS A ON B.AgencyOECL1 = A.AgencyCodeOEC -- join for Level 1 data
    WHERE B.AgencyCodeOEC <> B.AgencyOECL1
	      AND B.AgencyOECL1 <> '000000'
    GROUP BY B.BudgetStage
		,B.AgencyOECL1
		,B.PublishedBillingPeriod
		,B.BillingPeriod
		,B.EnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEM
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit

    -- level 2 data
    INSERT INTO @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency
        (BudgetStage
        ,PublishedBillingPeriod
        ,BillingPeriod
        ,AgencyCodeOEC
        ,AgencyName
        ,EnergyDeliveryType
        ,BudgetGroupDEM
        ,BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
        ,EnergyUsage
        ,StreetLightingFacilityPoints
        ,FacilityPointDollars
        ,EnergyDollars
        ,DemandDollars
        ,AgencyDivisionSeqId
        ,AgencyOECL1
		,AgencyOECL2
		,AgencyOECL3
		,AgencyLevel)
    SELECT B.BudgetStage
        ,B.PublishedBillingPeriod
        ,B.BillingPeriod
        ,B.AgencyOECL2
        ,MAX(A.AgencyShortDesc)
        ,B.EnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEM
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
        ,SUM(B.EnergyUsage)
        ,SUM(B.StreetLightingFacilityPoints)
        ,SUM(B.FacilityPointDollars)
        ,SUM(B.EnergyDollars)
        ,SUM(B.DemandDollars)
        ,MAX(A.AgencyDivisionSeqId)
        ,B.AgencyOECL1
		,B.AgencyOECL2
		,'000000' AS AgencyOECL3
		,MAX(A.agencyLevel)
    FROM @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency AS B
	    INNER JOIN @AgencyDivision AS A ON B.AgencyOECL2 = A.AgencyCodeOEC -- join for Level 1 data
    WHERE B.AgencyCodeOEC <> B.AgencyOECL2
		AND B.AgencyOECL2 <> '000000'
    GROUP BY B.BudgetStage
		,B.AgencyOECL1
		,B.AgencyOECL2
		,B.PublishedBillingPeriod
		,B.BillingPeriod
		,B.EnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEM
        ,B.BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit;

    --=========================================================================
    -- 4 Group total cost
    --=========================================================================
    INSERT INTO @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency
        (BudgetStage
        ,PublishedBillingPeriod
        ,BillingPeriod
        ,AgencyCodeOEC
        ,AgencyName
        ,EnergyDeliveryType
        ,BudgetGroupDEM
        ,BudgetGroupDEMName
        ,GenericEnergyDeliveryType
        ,GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
        ,EnergyUsage
        ,StreetLightingFacilityPoints
        ,FacilityPointDollars
        ,EnergyDollars
        ,DemandDollars
        ,AgencyDivisionSeqId
        ,AgencyOECL1
		,AgencyOECL2
		,AgencyOECL3
		,AgencyLevel)
    SELECT B.BudgetStage
        ,B.PublishedBillingPeriod
        ,B.BillingPeriod
        ,B.AgencyCodeOEC
        ,MAX(B.AgencyName)
        ,'N/A'
        ,0
        ,'N/A'
        ,'N/A'
        ,'Total Cost'
        ,SUM(B.EnergyUsage)
        ,SUM(B.StreetLightingFacilityPoints)
        ,SUM(B.FacilityPointDollars)
        ,SUM(B.EnergyDollars)
        ,SUM(B.DemandDollars)
        ,MAX(B.AgencyDivisionSeqId)
        ,MAX(B.AgencyOECL1)
		,MAX(B.AgencyOECL2)
		,MAX(B.AgencyOECL3)
		,MAX(B.agencyLevel)
    FROM @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency AS B
    WHERE B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit = 'Cost'
    GROUP BY B.BudgetStage
		,B.AgencyCodeOEC
		,B.PublishedBillingPeriod
		,B.BillingPeriod;

	-- DATASETS
	-- dataset1
	SELECT 'FY' + SUBSTRING(CAST(@fy AS VARCHAR(4)),3,2)+' Heat, Light and Power Budget' AS reportTitle;
	--   maybe add billing period to the title

	-- dataset2 BudgetByEnergyType
	SELECT ds1.AgencyName
		,ds1.GenericEnergyDeliveryType AS EnergyType
		,ds1.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit AS [Type]
		,ISNULL(ds1.July,0) AS July
		,ISNULL(ds1.August,0) AS August
		,ISNULL(ds1.September,0) AS September
		,ISNULL(ds1.October,0) AS October
		,ISNULL(ds1.November,0) AS November
		,ISNULL(ds1.December,0) AS December
		,ISNULL(ds1.January,0) AS January
		,ISNULL(ds1.February,0) AS February
		,ISNULL(ds1.March,0) AS March
		,ISNULL(ds1.April,0) AS April
		,ISNULL(ds1.May,0) AS May
		,ISNULL(ds1.June,0) AS June
		,(ISNULL(ds1.July,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.August,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.September,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.October,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.November,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.December,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.January,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.February,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.March,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.April,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.May,0)
			+ISNULL(ds1.June,0)) AS Total
	FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.PublishedBillingPeriod
			,CASE SUBSTRING(B.BillingPeriod,5,2)
				WHEN 01 THEN 'January'
				WHEN 02 THEN 'February'
				WHEN 03 THEN 'March'
				WHEN 04 THEN 'April'
				WHEN 05 THEN 'May'
				WHEN 06 THEN 'June'
				WHEN 07 THEN 'July'
				WHEN 08 THEN 'August'
				WHEN 09 THEN 'September'
				WHEN 10 THEN 'October'
				WHEN 11 THEN 'November'
				WHEN 12 THEN 'December'
			END MonthText
			,B.AgencyCodeOEC +' - '+AgencyName AgencyName
			,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
			,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
			,SUM(B.EnergyUsage) AS EnergyUsage
			,B.AgencyDivisionSeqId
			,B.AgencyOECL1
		FROM @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency AS B
		GROUP BY B.BudgetStage
			,B.PublishedBillingPeriod
			,B.BillingPeriod
			,B.AgencyCodeOEC
			,B.AgencyName
			,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
			,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
			,B.AgencyDivisionSeqId
			,B.AgencyOECL1
			,B.AgencyOECL2
			,B.AgencyOECL3
			,B.AgencyLevel
			,B.EnergyDeliveryType) AS datatable
			PIVOT (SUM(EnergyUsage) FOR MonthText IN ([July],[August],[September],[October],[November],[December],[January],[February],[March],[April],[May],[June])) AS pivottable
		) AS ds1
	ORDER BY ds1.AgencyName, [Type];

	----dataset3 BudgetByUtilityCompany&ServiceClass
	SELECT ds2.AgencyName
		,ds2.GenericEnergyDeliveryType AS EnergyType
		,ds2.BudgetGroupDEMName AS UtilityAndServiceType
		,ds2.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit AS [Type]
		,ISNULL(ds2.July,0) AS July
		,ISNULL(ds2.August	,0) AS August
		,ISNULL(ds2.September,0) AS September
		,ISNULL(ds2.October,0) AS October
		,ISNULL(ds2.November,0) AS November
		,ISNULL(ds2.December,0) AS December
		,ISNULL(ds2.January,0) AS January
		,ISNULL(ds2.February,0) AS February
		,ISNULL(ds2.March,0) AS March
		,ISNULL(ds2.April,0) AS April
		,ISNULL(ds2.May,0) AS May
		,ISNULL(ds2.June,0) AS June
		,(ISNULL(ds2.July,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.August,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.September,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.October,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.November,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.December,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.January,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.February,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.March,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.April,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.May,0)
			+ISNULL(ds2.June,0)) AS Total
	FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT PublishedBillingPeriod
			,CASE SUBSTRING(B.BillingPeriod,5,2)
				WHEN 01 THEN 'January'
				WHEN 02 THEN 'February'
				WHEN 03 THEN 'March'
				WHEN 04 THEN 'April'
				WHEN 05 THEN 'May'
				WHEN 06 THEN 'June'
				WHEN 07 THEN 'July'
				WHEN 08 THEN 'August'
				WHEN 09 THEN 'September'
				WHEN 10 THEN 'October'
				WHEN 11 THEN 'November'
				WHEN 12 THEN 'December'
			END MonthText
			,B.AgencyCodeOEC +' - '+ B.AgencyName AS AgencyName
			,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
			,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
			,B.BudgetGroupDEM
			,B.BudgetGroupDEMName
			,SUM(EnergyUsage) AS EnergyUsage
			,B.AgencyDivisionSeqId
			,B.AgencyOECL1
			,B.EnergyDeliveryType AS EnergyType
		FROM @BaseBudgetDataGroupByAgency AS B
		GROUP BY B.BudgetStage
			,B.PublishedBillingPeriod
			,B.BillingPeriod
			,B.AgencyCodeOEC
			,B.AgencyName
			,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryType
			,B.GenericEnergyDeliveryTypeUnit
			,B.BudgetGroupDEM
			,B.BudgetGroupDEMName
			,B.AgencyDivisionSeqId
			,B.AgencyOECL1
			,B.AgencyOECL2
			,B.AgencyOECL3
			,B.AgencyLevel
			,B.EnergyDeliveryType) AS datatable
			PIVOT (SUM(EnergyUsage) FOR MonthText IN ([July],[August],[September],[October],[November],[December],[January],[February],[March],[April],[May],[June])) AS pivottable
		) AS ds2
	ORDER BY ds2.AgencyOECL1, [Type], ds2.BudgetGroupDEMName;
END;
